name: Space Yahtzee
description:
Roll dice and explore the cosmos at the same time!

1. Spend money to roll up to 31 dice

2. Use dice to unlock research, or run missions

3.  Click on dice to hold them, then re-roll all non-held dice for an increasing cost

4. Win by running the Artemis mission

Created for JSC-Hack 2022 By Ben Weno and Victor Yu

https://devpost.com/software/space-yahtzee
